notes.note:
A new [Firefox Search widget with voice input][1] can be added to the Android home screen from the Android Widget section.


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/add-firefox-search-widget-your-home-screen
CSS Viewport-compat - Firefox for Android's mobile viewport behavior is now aligned with other browsers, resolving known compatibility issues with websites.

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
text:
We'd like to extend a special thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][1] who contributed to this release of Firefox!


  [1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2019/04/30/firefox-67-new-contributors/
title: Firefox for Android 67.0 Release
